Enable take pofit and trailing stoploss for currencies and other options. It should be as simple as dragging it to the position of choice on the chart itself like MT4, Ctrader etc. The current Stop loss order should not get cancelled automatically at the end of the trading day, it should last till the position is closed by the trader manually. Not having the above mentioned features makes it very inconvenient to trade for a part time trader who doesnt have time to be on chart 24/7.
